entry.title: Mediana i25 Affordable Body Composition Machine
entry.summary:
Vendor: Hci Fitness
Type:
Price: 3395.00

Products -> View All Body Composition Analyzers

* In Stock *

Results Sheet

Clinical Study

 

Results Interpretation Guide



Since 1993, Mediana has provided professional and general medical equipment and technology to help revitalize heart function and provide accurate measurement of biological signals.  With a combined total of over 500,000 products sold and installed globally, Mediana has a proven history of providing accurate and reliable medical equipment. Learn More About Mediana

 As the Exclusive North American partner of Mediana Body Composition Analyzers, Hci Fitness provides sales and support for the Mediana iSeries. 
 

 Mediana i35 Model Shown in Video

USER HEIGHT RANGE

 2'0" to 7'2"

MAX USER WEIGHT

500 lbs

Rotating Handle

Rotating Handles allow for an ergonomic testing position that does not put strain on user. 

  

Modern Design

The i25's sleek and approachable design is at home in any facility. 

Touch Screen Display

 4.3" LCD display prompts the user during the test and shows on screen results. 

Compact and Approachable 

The Mediana i25 has a discrete and approachable design, welcoming all types of users. 

Results Sheet

Skeletal Muscle & Body Fat Analysis

Body Composition Analysis: Total Body Water, Protein, Mineral, Body Fat

Body Fat %

Visceral Fat Grade

Abdominal Fat Ratio

Weight Control: BMI, Obesity Degree... 

Segmental Mass

Intake & Consumed Calories

Calorie Consumption

Body Type Analysis

Body Composition History

View Adult Results Sheet

Mediana Body Composition Analyzers are compatible with most printers on the market. You can check to see if your printer has the PCL5, PCL6, PWG or ESC P-R printer language. 

Otherwise we recommend the HP M110we

Compatible with Most Printers

Warranty Support

The Mediana i25 has one year warranty period and US Based Customer Support and Nation Wide Service Coverage. . 

CPT Code for Reimbursement

The American Medical Association has assigned  Category III CPT Code 0358T for Whole Body Composition Analysis tests whose results are generated through bioelectric impedance analysis (BIA).

Category III Code 0358T 

Ultimately, reimbursement will depend on the policies of each insurance carrier.

entry.title: Mediana i55 Premium Body Composition Analyzer
entry.summary:
Vendor: Hci Fitness
Type:
Price: 12995.00

Products -> Body Composition Analyzers

Results Sheet

Clinical Study

 

Results Interpretation Guide

Since 1993, Mediana has provided professional and general medical equipment and technology to help revitalize heart function and provide accurate measurement of biological signals.  With a combined total of over 500,000 products sold and installed globally, Mediana has a proven history of providing accurate and reliable medical equipment. Learn More About Mediana

 As the Exclusive North American partner of Mediana Body Composition Analyzers, Hci Fitness provides sales and support for the Mediana iSeries. 

    USER HEIGHT RANGE

     2'0" to 7'2"

    MAX USER WEIGHT

    500 lbs

    Body Fat Percentage

    Mediana iSeries Body Composition Analyzers provide quick and accurate Body Fat Percentage measurements. Mediana iSeries devices are 98.4% accurate when compared to DEXA.  

    		  

    Impedance and Phase Angle Measurement 

    The i55 uses both Bioelectrical Impedance and phase angle measurement during body composition analysis.

    Multiple Sampling Frequencies 

    With 6 bioelectrical impedance frequencies the i55 ensures accurate and detailed segmental analyzes.

    5/50/100/250/500/1,000 kHz

     

     

    PC Software

    View and Organize Member Results on the included Mediana iManager software.

    10.4" LCD Color Touch Screen

    Large and easy to ready display prompts the user during the test and shows on screen results. 

     

    Durable Design 

    The Mediana i55 has a robust design ensuring that your investment will last for years to come. 

     

    Advanced Results Sheets 

    Segmental body composition analysis: Tetra-polar 8 point electrodes system gives accurate measure of segmental body fat and muscle mass.

     

    Body Fat Percentage

    Upper / Lower Body Imbalance - Body Balance

    Kidney Failure - Extracellular Water Ratio

    Abdominal Obesity - Visceral Fat

    Skinny Fat- Skeletal and Body Fat

    Muscle Mass- Body Composition

    View Adult Results Sheet

     

    Warranty Support

    The Mediana i55 has one year warranty period and US Based Customer Support and Nation Wide Service Coverage. 

    CPT Code for Reimbursement

    The American Medical Association has assigned  Category III CPT Code 0358T for Whole Body Composition Analysis tests whose results are generated through bioelectric impedance analysis (BIA).

    Category III Code 0358T 

    Ultimately, reimbursement will depend on the policies of each insurance carrier.

     

    Bioelectrical Impedance Analysis Using Segmental Multi Frequency Measurement

    The Mediana i55 Body Composition Analyzer is a BIA (Bioelectrical Impedance Analysis) technology system using multi-frequency measurement method providing precise yet meticulous Body Water (Extracellular Water) and Body Composition Analysis.

    The Mediana i55 Body Composition Analyzer uses 1/5/50/100/250/500 kHz frequencies during body composition analysis.

     

    Segmental Body Mass and Body Fat Composition Analysis

    Tetra-polar 8 point tactile electrodes system provides accurate segmental
    (Body Fat and Muscle Mass) analysis and Body Balance evaluation through a user friendly chart.

     Body Type Matrix 

    Historical Tracking for User IDs

    Accurate Results - Proprietary 
    Body Composition Analysis Algorithm


    Clinical trials of Golden Standards of Body Composition Analysis methods
    (DEXA, CT, and Isotope Dilution) were conducted in professional institutions
    to a wide range of demographics ranging from elderly to small children.

     Clinical Trial 

     

    Advanced Outputs

    Segmental Water Analysis

    Breaks down the intracellular and extracellular water retention by limb. 

    Phase Angle 

    Produces the users Phase Angle for an additional wellness indicator. 

    +5 Women

    +7 Men

    Exercise and Nutrition Guide

     Provides a tail maid exercise and nutrition guide for your members. 

    Detailed food and water intake recommendations and exercise guide.   

    Extracellular Water Ratio

    Extracellular Water Ratio presented which can be used for diagnosis of edema and health status evaluation by professional medical personnel. 

    Abdominal Obesity Analysis

    Abdominal Obesity Analysis presents Waist Circumference, Abdominal Fat Ratio, Visceral Fat Area, Subcutaneous Fat Area,
    and Visceral to Subcutaneous Fat Ratio (VSR) allowing a qualitative and in depth analysis of abdominal obesity.

    Exercise Guidance

    Based on the results of Body Composition Analysis; Basal Metabolic Rate and Total Energy Expenditure is calculated
    to compute Target Body Fat, Exercise Intensity, Calorie Consumption of Exercise, and Estimated Completion,
    which are then all used for a systematic guidance towards a healthy body. 

    FMI and FFMI indexes

    Fat Mass Index (FMI) and Fat Free Mass Index (FFMI) not only covers up the limitations of BMI
    but also allows an accurate analysis of obesity.

    Body Composition History

    View up to 7 historical results in comparison to your current test results. 

    Quickly compare Weight, Skeletal Muscle and Body Fat Percentage.

    Intake & Consumed Calories

     

    Blind Mode

    Whilst processing Body Composition Analysis, “Blind Mode” can be turned on/off to show or
    hide the numerical values of weight and fat mass for privacy concerns.
    The blind mode does not affect the results sheet printed which displays the weight and fat mass values regardless.

    Ergonomic Design for Comfortable Measuring Posture

    The wide rotational radius of the electrode handle combined with its rotatable versatility prompts a precise
    yet comfortable measuring posture reducing measurement errors.

    Downloadable Database

    Body Composition Analysis Result Sheet, Segmental Body Composition, various body composition analysis data,
    nutritional information, and exercise guidance provided with results in the PC server. Our PC software is compatible
    with EMR (BMP image), PACS (DICOM, Worklist), and digital height scales.

    Smartphone App

    By a simple QR scan, results can be viewed via smartphones. Also, using our smartphone app allows the management of cumulative results

    FDA REGISTERED 510(K) MEDICAL DEVICE

    HCI Fitness does not provide medical advice, diagnosis or treatment

entry.title: Mediana i35 Body Composition Analyzer
entry.summary:
Vendor: Hci Fitness
Type: Body Composition Analyzer
Price: 5995.00

Products -> Body Composition Analyzers

* In Stock *


 

Results Sheet

Clinical Study

 

Results Interpretation Guide

 Since 1993, Mediana has provided professional and general medical equipment and technology to help revitalize heart function and provide accurate measurement of biological signals.  With a combined total of over 500,000 products sold and installed globally, Mediana has a proven history of providing accurate and reliable medical equipment. Learn More About Mediana


 As the Exclusive North American partner of Mediana Body Composition Analyzers, Hci Fitness provides sales and support for the Mediana iSeries. 

USER HEIGHT RANGE

 2'0" to 7'2"

MAX USER WEIGHT

500 lbs

Body Fat Percentage

Mediana iSeries Body Composition Analyzers provide quick and accurate Body Fat Percentage measurements. Mediana iSeries devices are 98.4% accurate when compared to DEXA.

  

Foldable Design

The two way foldable design allows the i35 to be easily transported.

7" LCD Color Touch Screen

Large and easy to ready display prompts the user during the test and shows on screen results. 

 

Compact and Approachable 

The Mediana i35 has a discrete and approachable design, welcoming all types of users. 

Adults and Children

The Mediana i35 allows for two different results sheets to be printed depending on the users age. 

View Adult Results Sheet

View Children Results Sheet

Warranty Support

The Mediana i35 has one year warranty period and US Based Customer Support and Nation Wide Service Coverage. . 

CPT Code for Reimbursement

The American Medical Association has assigned  Category III CPT Code 0358T for Whole Body Composition Analysis tests whose results are generated through bioelectric impedance analysis (BIA).

Category III Code 0358T 

Ultimately, reimbursement will depend on the policies of each insurance carrier.

Segmental Multi Frequency Measurement

The Mediana i35 Body Composition Analyzer is a BIA (Bioelectrical Impedance Analysis) technology system using multi-frequency measurement method providing precise yet meticulous Body Water (Extracellular Water) and Body Composition Analysis.

The Mediana i35 Body Composition Analyzer uses 5, 50, 100, 250kHz frequencies during body composition analysis.

 

Segmental Body Mass and Body Fat Composition Analysis

Tetra-polar 8 point tactile electrodes system provides accurate segmental
(Body Fat and Muscle Mass) analysis and Body Balance evaluation through a user friendly chart.

 Body Type Matrix 

Historical Tracking for User IDs

Accurate Results - Proprietary 
Body Composition Analysis Algorithm


Clinical trials of Golden Standards of Body Composition Analysis methods
(DEXA, CT, and Isotope Dilution) were conducted in professional institutions
to a wide range of demographics ranging from elderly to small children.

 Clinical Trial 

Printable Results Sheet

 


Click Here to View Larger 


Explore the Mediana i35 Results Sheet


The Mediana i35 allows users to print a results page that visually displays health data in an intuitive easy to follow format.  The Mediana i35 includes a free body composition result interpretation guide that covers each section in detail.




 

On Screen Instant Results

After the users test is complete, the display will show the test results visually in order to quickly show the user's trend and any significant changes. 

Compare the Mediana™ i35 to the InBody™ 570 Body Composition Analyzers 

Advanced Outputs

Extracellular Water Ratio

Extracellular Water Ratio presented which can be used for diagnosis of edema and health status evaluation by professional medical personnel. 

Abdominal Obesity Analysis

Abdominal Obesity Analysis presents Waist Circumference, Abdominal Fat Ratio, Visceral Fat Area, Subcutaneous Fat Area,
and Visceral to Subcutaneous Fat Ratio (VSR) allowing a qualitative and in depth analysis of abdominal obesity.

Exercise Guidance

Based on the results of Body Composition Analysis; Basal Metabolic Rate and Total Energy Expenditure is calculated
to compute Target Body Fat, Exercise Intensity, Calorie Consumption of Exercise, and Estimated Completion,
which are then all used for a systematic guidance towards a healthy body. 

FMI and FFMI indexes

Fat Mass Index (FMI) and Fat Free Mass Index (FFMI) not only covers up the limitations of BMI
but also allows an accurate analysis of obesity.

Body Composition History

View up to 7 historical results in comparison to your current test results. 

Quickly compare Weight, Skeletal Muscle and Body Fat Percentage.

Intake & Consumed Calories

 

Blind Mode

Whilst processing Body Composition Analysis, “Blind Mode” can be turned on/off to show or
hide the numerical values of weight and fat mass for privacy concerns.
The blind mode does not affect the results sheet printed which displays the weight and fat mass values regardless.

Ergonomic Design for Comfortable Measuring Posture

The wide rotational radius of the electrode handle combined with its rotatable versatility prompts a precise
yet comfortable measuring posture reducing measurement errors.

Downloadable Database

Body Composition Analysis Result Sheet, Segmental Body Composition, various body composition analysis data,
nutritional information, and exercise guidance provided with results in the PC server. Our PC software is compatible
with EMR (BMP image), PACS (DICOM, Worklist), and digital height scales.

Smartphone App

By a simple QR scan, results can be viewed via smartphones. Also, using our smartphone app allows the management of cumulative results

FDA REGISTERED 510(K) MEDICAL DEVICE

HCI Fitness does not provide medical advice, diagnosis or treatment
